name: the EBRD Annual Meeting of the Board of Governors in Kyiv in 1998
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the Annual Meeting of the Board of Governors of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) held in1998 in the city of Kyiv
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is a depiction of the small National Emblem of Ukraine within a square, made by the following inscriptions: УКРАЇНА (Ukraine) (above), 2 ГРИВНІ (2 Hryvnias) (underneath), 1998 (on the left).
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a logotype of the Annual Meeting of the Board of Governors of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) in Kyiv in 1998, consisting of a depiction of the monument to the legendary founders of Kyiv and the EBRD logotype within a frame of inscriptions: EBRD ANNUAL MEETING (underneath), BOARD OF GOVERNORS (at the right), KYIV MAY 1998 (at the left).
